name: CTScanIncludingChest
title: CT Scan Including Chest
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values includes codes and concepts for a CT Scan which includes the chest.  These codes are to be used when an eCQM needs to determine if a patient has had a CT scan.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had a CT scan which includes the chest.  Using the Quality Data Model, these will be used in the category of Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent a CT scan which includes the chest.  Codes used are to be ICD10PCS codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
